courseSectionInformation: Same as STAT 551. Prerequisite: MATH 541 or consent of instructor.
description: Mathematical foundations of probability and stochastic processes; probability measures, random variables, distribution functions, convergence theory, the Central Limit Theorem, conditional expectation, and martingale theory. Same as STAT 551. Prerequisite: MATH 541 or consent of instructor.
label: Theory of Probability I
sectionRegistrationNotes: Not intended for Undergrad - Urbana-Champaign. Not intended for MS:Economics:Policy Econ -UIUC or MS: Financial Engineering.
